description:
I like the design of Neumorphism very much.

Design that can be implemented with HTML details / summary tags.


You can create accordion and collapsible menus, without the need for JavaScript.


<details>
  <summary>summary</summary>
  <p>detailsdetailsdetailsdetails</p>
</details>


<summary>

This is the title of the accordion and can be placed only once.


<details>

This is the part that opens and closes.

It can contain multiple elements, multiple paragraphs, lists, etc.
